channel.title: Need Help Port Fowarding-- Need Mod Help
channel.description:
Ok i really want to port foward because i want to release my Client and i want more people to connect so please someone help me with this.. i have been on port foward forums and stuff everywere but on all the lists my router is not on there i got a speedtouch 330 and it is connected into my usb port on the p.c so please please help i will be so greatfull!!
for further info contact me on msn at samma100@hotmail.com
[size=30pt]PLEASE[/size]

item.title: Need Help Port Fowarding-- Need Mod Help
item.dc:creator: @bigmac bigmac
item.description:
@bigmac wrote:

nope its a lil silver box with two flashy lights =) but i dont really want to turn it off becasue wont i get loads of virus’s

EDIT:or dont i go onto change firewall settings and go to exceptions and add a port or something ?? if i do what port name and number

item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

If your connected straight to the modem with a USB line, you dont have to forward any ports, just turn your firewall off and your set

item.source: Need Help Port Fowarding-- Need Mod Help

item.title: Need Help Port Fowarding-- Need Mod Help
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

Yep, a SpeedTouch 330 is a DSL modem. What router do you have?

Is there two boxes that your computer is connected to? One should be a modem (your SpeedTouch 330) and the other should be a router. If there is only one box, then you may just have a modem and there will be no need to port forward.

Is your computer the only one on the DSL line?

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help Port Fowarding-- Need Mod Help
